steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Proofing' section, click on the 'Thesaurus' button.
A sidebar with the thesaurus options will appear on the right side of the document.
Enter a word in the search box to find synonyms and related words.
Click on any of the suggested words to replace the selected word in the document.
To close the thesaurus, click on the 'X' button in the top-right corner of the sidebar.
